entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

entry.title: Markdown语法
entry.content: 123#一级标题##二级标题###三级标题 12#这个标题有1个id {#my_id}##2个class {.class1 .class2} 斜体字斜体字这会是 粗体 的文字你也 组合 这些符号 这个文字将会被横线删除 Item 1 Item 2 Item 2a Item 2b Item 1 Item 2 Item 3 Item 3a Item 3b http://github.com - 自动生成！GitHub 正如 Kanye West 所说： We’re living the future sothe present is our past. 如下，三个或者更多的 连字符 星号 下划线 我觉得你应该在这里使用<addr> 才对。 123require 'redcarpet'markdown = Redcarpet.new("Hello World!")puts markdown.to_html {.class1 .class}123function add(x, y) { return x + y} {.line-numbers}123function add(x, y) { return x + y} First Header Second Header Content from cell 1 Content from cell 2 Content in the first column Content in the second column :smile::fa-car: 30^th^ H~2~O
